name: ChaoSquash VR
description: In this game you have to keep the fragile balance between taking too much on you and absolutely loosing control. This is done through decision making upgrade system. At the same time, you have a pretty intense workout. Basically, this game is a rollercoaster of physical and intellectual activities. I'm pretty happy with what I've got in 7 days, not sure if I will contine working on it, it really depends on if people get interested in it.
